definitions.definition: A dressing made from vegetable oil, raw egg yolks and seasoning, used on salads, with french fries, in sandwiches etc.
Any cold dish with that dressing as an ingredient.
definitions.example: We served a lobster mayonnaise as a starter.

definitions.definition: Any cream, for example for moisturizing the face or conditioning the hair, for which the base is egg yolks and oil.
